name: Witch Season
description:
This game is Ludum Dare 49 sumbission.

//a short game about unstable season change

controls:

1. standart wasd

2. e to skip lines in dialogues

3. to activate dialogue with smth collide with it

Art I used:

https://jestan.itch.io/trees

https://analogstudios.itch.io/forest

https://9e0.itch.io/witches-pack

Music:

https://soundcloud.com/arthurvost/ghost-of-the-kitchen

//some tips (don't read this if you want to solve puzzle on your own!)

  • water frozes in winter
  • seeds can be planted in spring
  • apple will grow in august
  • mushrooms are harvested in autumn
